SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into messages (id, postmessages, status, time, messagestypeid, fromuserid, touserid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postmessages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{messagestypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fromuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{touserid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update messages set postmessages = #{postmessages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, messagestypeid = #{messagestypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fromuserid = #{fromuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, touserid = #{touserid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, postmessages, status, time, messagestypeid, fromuserid, touserid from messages
